label: Books on EU Policies on Migration and Asylum
description: A selection of titles on EU policies on migration and asylum available from the European Parliament Library.

list.label: Differentiation and Politicization : The Case of EU Migration Policy.
Global Migration Governance from Below : Actors, Spaces, Discourses
Migration, EU Integration and the Balkan Route
The borders of the EU : European Integration, 'Schengen' and the control of migration
Debating Immigrants and Refugees in Central Europe: Politicising and Framing Newcomers in the Media and Political Arenas
The Criminalisation of Irregular Migration in Europe : Globalisation, Deterrence, and Vicious Cycles
Transferring asylum norms to EU neighbours : multi-scalar policies and practices in Ukraine
Contesting Migration Crises in Central Eastern Europe : A Political Economy Approach to Poland's Responses Towards Refugee Protection Provision.
